# Warszawa Miedzeszyn railway station

|owned = Polskie Koleje Państwowe S.A.
|line =
|platform = 1
|tracks = 2
|opened =

|former =

|map_image = W-wa miedzeszyn.svg

|map_caption = Warszawa Miedzeszyn located on the Warsaw Railway Junction
}}
Warszawa Miedzeszyn railway station is a railway station in the Wawer district of Warsaw, Poland. As of 2012, it is served by Koleje Mazowieckie, who run the KM7 services from Warszawa Zachodnia to Dęblin and by Szybka Kolej Miejska, who run the S1 services from Pruszków PKP to Otwock.
